    make-data

    Function reference

    All functions

    dir_spec()
    Specify Input/Output Directories For Project
    find_UTM_zone()
    Functions for converting longitude and latitude to UTM zones and coordinates.
    id_ebird_files()
    Identify and Decompress Relevant eBird Files for Downstream Importing and Munging
    import_jdat()
    Import the Prepared RDS Data For Use in JAGS
    longlat_to_UTM()
    Convert long, lat Locations to UTM coordinates and zones Returns a data frame containing the UTM values, the zone and the hemisphere associated with long lat coordinates.
    make_array()
    Cast Data to Array or Matrix for Use in JAGS
    make_bbs_spatial()
    Manipulate the BBS route shapefiles
    make_bundle()
    Bundle Data for Use in JAGS
    make_ebird_spatial()
    Create an SF object for eBird Observations
    make_gam()
    Function for Generating Basis Functions
    make_inits_list()
    Create a List of Repeated Initial Values for each Chain
    make_mat()
    Make 2-D array (Matrix for JAGS)
    make_spatial_grid()
    Create a Spatial Sampling Grid
    munge_date_time() munge_date_time()
    Munge Dates and Times of the eBird and BBS Datasets
    munge_ebird_data()
    Create and Write or Load In the Filtered eBird Data
    pluck_multiple()
    Pluck Multiple Elements from List Object
    run_MCMC_allcode()
    Run MCMC in or Out of Parallel in nimble
    run_in_jags()
    Run BUGS Model in JAGS
    run_in_nimble()
    Run BUGS Model in nimble
    scan_files()
    Check For Existing Files
    set_mcmc_specs()
    Set Specifications for MCMC
    set_proj_shorthand()
    Auto generate a subdirectory name based on project parameters
    standardize()
    Center and/or Z-Score Transform a Vector or Array
    trySave()
    Try to Save Results or plot(results) to File
    zerofill_ebird()
    Create a Zero-filled Data Object for eBird Observations
